title: Elon Musk defends mass Twitter layoffs as critics see a ‘lack of care and thoughtfulness’
dc:creator: Barbara Ortutay, Matt O'Brien
description: Musk tweeted late Friday he had no choice “when the company is losing over $4M/day."
content:encoded: Musk tweeted late Friday he had no choice “when the company is losing over $4M/day." Read More
